name: RTCConfiguration
description: The RTCConfiguration dictionary is used to provide configuration options for an RTCPeerConnection. It may be passed into the constructor when instantiating a connection, or used with the RTCPeerConnection.getConfiguration() and RTCPeerConnection.setConfiguration() methods, which allow inspecting and changing the configuration while a connection is established.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: RTCConfiguration - WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
